metadata.description: Front-end engineer who loves UX, Performance and Design.

metadata.title: Vinicius Vicentini
metadata.description: Front-end engineer who loves UX, Performance and Design.

heading.title: Greetings
heading.description: Sharing my projects, trips and articles.

image.alt: Photo of Vinicius Vicentini, looking up and behind him is the Rijksmuseum, in Amsterdam

content.part-1: Hi, I'm Vini, my first foray into programming came from editing Mods for Counter-Strike 1.6. Then I had some websites and blogs and eventually decided to turn it into a career.
content.part-2: I enjoy working where design meets code. CSS, Design Systems, and Animations - these are my passion points. Crafting exceptional component APIs that users love to use.
content.part-3: In my free time, I enjoy reading books, cooking, traveling and spending time with my dogs.
